Sinopse: Two Britons are captured and enslaved by invading Romans and taken to Rome. Hengist Pod creates useless inventions, while Horsa is a brave and cunning fighter. Cleo doesn't want him around and plots for his sudden demise...—Simon N. McIntosh-Smith
